name: FIGHT! [LIMITED EDITION] - Pink Breast Cancer Awareness T-shirt
description:
October is Breast Cancer Awareness Month and we are trying to do our part in the FIGHT against this disease. We need your help! 

The release of this LIMITED EDITION t-shirt with help us both raise awareness and raise donations for those in need within our communities. 

With each shirt sold, we will donate $5.00 to a local family in the community that continues to battle the effects of breast cancer. We will take email recommendations to find those in need. The donations are meant to provide smiles and to be used for whatever the family so chooses. 

Student sections get involved! Our goal is to sell at least 500 shirts. They will be delivered in time for week nine of the high school football season (Oct. 25) and possibly sooner. 

Shirts can only be ordered online from September 30 - October 6.

*******IMPORTANT*********
If you are a student and want the shirt delivered to the school enter the discount code "SCHOOLPICKUP" when checking out. Then when you get to the PayPal page please write what high school you go to in the "NOTES" SECTION." 

This shirt is printed on American Apparel and fits slimmer than most. Sizes include XS-XXL. 
Poly-Cotton (50% Polyester / 50% Cotton)

name: Legends Never Die T-Shirt (Available in 3 Colors!)
description:
Do you want to be remembered?  Are you willing to do whatever it takes to become the best you can be. Win a championship, break a record, or flat out just be known as the guy/girl that outworked everyone. You know, the first one to the gym and the last one to leave.

Set an example, demonstrate leadership, and become a legend. It's the only way to live forever. 

This shirt is a 60/40, polyester/cotton blend. It is fashion fitted and extra soft for those that want a shirt to wear to the field or out on the town.

name: 2012 Tri-Valley Football DVD: Perfection!
description:
Coming off a record-breaking season in 2011, the latest Tri-Valley football team still managed to make history of their own!

Guided by the all-Ohio duo of QB Nathan Strock and RB/LB Austin Jones, the Scotties dominated their regular season opponents en route to the team's first-ever 10-0 record and back-to-back Muskingum Valley League championships. Their lone regular season challenge came in week 4 when the Dawgs had to come from behind to knock off rival Dover, 28-21.

Unfortunately, a Regional semifinal loss to New Albany ended the 2012 campaign well short of expectations. Despite earning the No. 1 seed in Division II, Region 7, Tri-Valley slipped to the Eagles, 42-35.

This marked the 4th season that Storied Rivals Sports Media,LLC documented the Scotties' season, and once again, history was captured, allowing these memories to LIVE FOREVER!

Coverage off all 12 games is included on this DVD, plus player interviews, locker room, pregame footage, and never-before-seen moments. Relive this season forever!

Total Run Time: 92 minutes

Produced, edited and filmed by Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC 
Copyright 2012

name: 2012 Tri-Valley Girls Soccer DVD
description:
Behind one of the strongest soccer traditions in Southeastern Ohio, the Tri-Valley girls soccer team enjoyed a highlight filled 2012. 

The excitement and fun produced by this tight knit team led to 12 wins and a 2nd place finish in the Muskingum Valley League. Their friendship and passion for the game is just as apparent on film. Experience the ups and down of the season and see what the seniors have to say, as they recap their most memorable times on the field. 

Not many soccer teams have a film like this to relive the season. The 2012 Lady Dawgs in 2012 became Storied Rivals' first-ever soccer client. 

This DVD features highlights from 8 games, including senior night vs. Philo, and the tournament loss to West Holmes. Not to mention, player commentary and never-before-seeen behind the scenes footage.

Total Run Time: 43 minutes

Filmed, Edited, & Produced by Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC
Copyright 2012

name: 2012 ECOL Cheerleading Championships DVD
description:
In what's become a great tradition, the East Central Ohio League Cheerleading Championships once again lived up to the hype in 2012! Dover High School hosted the event for a second-consecutive year in front of a capacity crowd on Saturday, November 10, 2012. 

The gym was packed to see another year of awesome routines and amazing athletes! The competition was divided into five divisions: 7th grade, 8th grade, 9th grade, Junior Varsity, and Varsity.

Claymont walked away with the Varsity division championship, preventing New Philadelphia from a 3-peat. Relive all the great routines and moments with this DVD!

Participating schools included:
Cambridge
Coshocton
Claymont
Dover 
Marietta
Meadowbrook
New Philadelphia
Rosecrans

Note: River View and Zanesville did not participate. 

Approximate Total Run Time: 60 minutes
Approximate Ship Date: Dec. 18, 2012

Copyright 2012 Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC

name: 2012 John Glenn Basketball: Tradition Continues With 3-Peat!
description:
One year after putting together the most successful season in school history, John Glenn kept the course despite losing All-Ohio guard Jake Heagen to graduation. 

For the 3rd year in a row the Muskies won the Muskingum Valley League championship, doing it in impressive fashion with a 16-0 record. The first undefeated champion in 10 years!

Behind MVL Player of the Year Zack Atkins, John Glenn won it's second straight Sectional crown before falling to New Philadelphia 38-36 in a Division II District championship game. 

Greg Woodard's team finished with a 20-3 overall record

This DVD features highlights from 10 different games, player commentary and behind the scenes footage! These are memories that will live forever.

Total Run Time: 35 Minutes

Copyright 2012 Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC

name: 2011 ECOL Cheerleading Championships DVD
description:
Talk about some entertainment! These girls represent some of the East Central Ohio League's best athletes. The proof can be found on this action packed DVD! Bet you can't pull off these types of stunts! 

On November 12th, 2011 nine schools from the East Central Ohio League went head-to-head at Dover High School in a cheer off. For the 2nd consecutive year, New Philadelphia claimed the varsity division championship, but the Quakers weren't alone in putting together an amazing routine! Each school brought their own creativity to the competition. No one left disappointed!

Luckily you can experience the excitement again with this limited-edition DVD produced by Storied Rivals.

Levels/ Grades: 7th, 8th, 9th, Junior Varsity, Varsity

Schools include:

Cambridge
Claymont
Coshocton
Dover
Marietta
Meadowbrook
New Philadelphia
River View
Zanesville

*DVD will be available the week of Dec. 19, 2011

Copyright 2011 Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC

name: 2011 Tri-Valley Football DVD: Dawgs Deliver!
description:
Year-by-year new football history is being made at Tri-Valley High School (Dresden, OH). After decades of subpar seasons, head coach Justin Buttermore has turned the Dawgs into a consistent contender in Division II.

Making it's 5th playoff appearance in the last 6 years, Tri-Valley reached the Region 7 final for the first time ever. A gut-wrenching overtime loss to Marion Franklin ended the season and cost the Scotties a spot in the state final four.

With junior playmakers like QB Nathan Strock and RB Austin Jones and a cast of 15 seniors, Tri-Valley won its 4th outright Muskingum Valley League Championship in school history and racked up an impressive 11-2 record 

Wins over state powers Upper Arlington, Sheridan, and New Albany this year's team DVD produced by Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC is full of unforgettable moments and unseen footage from all 13 games!

This DVD also features player interviews, locker room and pregame footage. Relive this season forever!

Produced, edited and filmed by Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC
Copyright 2011

name: 2011 Zanesville Football DVD: Welcome to the League!
description:
With a beefed up schedule and new league, Zanesville (Ohio) had it's hands full in 2011. 

Taking on the likes of state-power Ursuline and perennial playoff contender Dover, the Blue Devils failed to advance to week 11 for a second straight season.

Despite a quick 5-1 start, ZHS got a quick introduction into the East Central Ohio League with losses to Dover, New Philadelphia and Cambridge in consecutive weeks to finish 6-4 overall. 

Storied Rivals documented the journey for a second year, capturing all of the memories, success and frustration of 2011. These highlights are all included on the 50-minute feature film produced by Storied Rivals.

This DVD also features player interviews, locker room and pregame footage. Relive this season forever!

Produced, edited and filmed by Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC
Copyright 2011

name: 2011 John Glenn Basketball DVD: Shooting for the Schott!
description:
It was the best season in John Glenn basketball history and this DVD will bring back all of the emotion from that sensational tournament run!

Behind the performance of All-Ohio performer Jake Heagen and his cast of teammates, the Muskies advanced to the school's first-ever Regional final. An overtime loss to Bishop Hartley ended their year with a school best 22-3 record. 

Highlights of the DVD includes player commentary, behind the scenes footage and the unforgettable wins along the way! 

Remember the MVL championship win at Sheridan to close the regular season? How about the upset over #2 Carrollton for the school's first district title in over 25 years? Or how about Heagen's monumental dunk against Chillicothe?

This DVD has it all so make sure you never forget the best team in school history!

Total Run Time: 50 minutes 

Produced, edited and filmed by Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC

name: The Maver Method: Secrets of Softball Hitting Success DVD
description:
The Maver Method is a simple yet powerful technique/ program of hitting that is customized for every hitter in order to generate maximum softball-hitting consistency, contact, and power with every swing. It is a combination of mental practice, emotional control, and an understanding and confident execution of the biomechanics of hitting. 

Dr. Dot covers everything you need to know to get you and/or your team into tip-top hitting form and raise those batting averages from meager to masterful.

"I wanted to find a method to make our hitters more powerful, yet disciplined hitters ... I have seen immediate improvement. Even our best hitters have been able to implement some of the basic concepts to help their swing."
Donna Newberry; Muskingum University Head Coach; NFCA Hall of Fame inductee, NCAA D-III Career wins leader, 2001 NCAA D-III National Champs.

Total Run Time: 56 minutes

Copyright 2010, Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC

name: 2010 Newark Catholic Basketball DVD: History Rewritten!
description:
For decades Newark Catholic has been known as an athletic powerhouse in football, volleyball and baseball; add boy's basketball to that list.

In 2010, a group of six seniors put Green Wave basketball on the map by finishing the season ranked No. 1 in the final Division IV Associated Press poll. Behind coach Drew Meister, NC turned in a school-record 19-1 regular season and marched on to a state runner-up finish. 

Even better news...Storied Rivals was along for the ride with camera rolling. The joy and emotion of this record-breaking season is all included on this storybook DVD. The players' chemistry and talent is on display with big wins over Bexley and rivals Heath and Licking Valley.  

Get inside the locker room to hear coach Meister's heartfelt postgame speech following the state championship loss to Dayton Jefferson among other never-before-seen footage . A bloopers section is also included from this group of guys who loved to have fun every time they stepped on the floor.  

Copyright 2010 Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC

name: 2010 Zanesville Basketball DVD: Final Four!
description:
The Blue Devils are back! For the first time since a state-runner up finish in 1997, Zanesville returned to the state final four and this DVD highlights that journey. 

Do you remember Tanner Gibson's game-saving heroics against Maysvillle? Want to see him hit that game-winner again? How about that emotional win over DeSales in the Regional Final. Remember how amazing it felt to beat the Stallions and return to Columbus?

This DVD is the only way to get those memories back. Emotion and excitement was at an all-time high with this team as Scott Aronhalt's squad overcame an up-and-down regular season to become one of the best in school history.

Hear from the players and what they had to say about the unforgettable ride to "The Schott" in March, 2010. 

Storied Rivals documents this journey from start to finish in a way like you've never seen before. From the joys of a championship to the agony of defeat, this DVD has it all. 

Copyright 2010 Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC

Runtime:

name: 2010 ECOL Cheerleading Championships DVD
description:
Who says cheerleading isn't a sport? 

On November 13th, 2010 nine schools from the East Central Ohio League clashed at Coshocton High School for bragging rights. New Philadelphia walked away with the varsity division championship, but the Quakers weren't the only ones with impressive performances! Witness the excitement again with this limited-edition DVD produced by Storied Rivals.

Levels/ Grades: 7th, 8th, 9th, Junior Varsity, Varsity

Schools include:

Cambridge
Claymont
Coshocton
Dover
Meadowbrook
New Philadelphia
River View
Rosecrans
Zanesville

Runtime: 82 minutes
Copyright 2010 Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC

name: 2009 Tri-Valley Scotties Football DVD: MVL Champions
description:
Top Dawgs yet again in the Muskingum Valley League! In 2009, Tri-Valley ran the table in the MVL going undefeated and wrapping up the regular season at 9-1. 

Too many memories to count including: a monumental win at rival Sheridan, a senior night victory over John Glenn and a heart-breaking loss to Olentangy Orange in the OHSAA Division II playoffs. 

This DVD has it all! Emotion, excitement and the agony of defeat are all the elements that make this keepsake priceless. Also included are player interviews, locker room speeches and the MVL trophy presentation.  

Copyright 2009 Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC

Runtime:

name: 2009 John Glenn Football DVD
description:
The Muskies fought through a tough year in 2009, and that relentless effort shows in this action-packed DVD. 

Nowhere else will you find the highlights and unforgettable moments that Storied Rivals captured on film.

This DVD tells the story and showcases John Glenn's struggle through the rugged MVL. Interviews, locker room and post game footage are among the features that make the film one-of-a-kind.
 
Copyright 2009 Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC

name: 2011 John Glenn Cheer & Dance Competition DVD
description:
Over 40 teams competed in this event at John Glenn High School in New Concord, Ohio on February 20, 2011! 

Miss the competition or just want to have that killer routine forever on your shelf? This DVD will make sure you never forget a cheer or tumble.

Custom graphics, crisp routine music, a easy to navigate DVD menu and creative cover artwork make this a must have keepsake for your cheerleader. 

EXPECTED SHIP DATE: MARCH 31, 2011

Copyright 2011. Storied Rivals Sports Media, LLC
